original_title: Guns N' Roses Made In Argentina
overview: Estadio River Plate, Buenos Aires, Argentina  July 17th 1993  Made In Argentina  1. Intro  2. Nightrain  3. Mr. Brownstone  4. You Ain't The First  5. You're Crazy  6. Used To Love Her  7. Jam & Imagine  8. Patience  9. Knockin' On Heaven's Door  10. November Rain  11. Dead Horse  12. Band Introduction & Drum Solo  13. You Could Be Mine  14. Sweet Child O' Mine  15. Jam & Mother  16. tagline: The Last Show Of The Use Your Illusion Tour 1993
title: Guns N' Roses Made In Argentina
